name: Portfolio Website
discription: Developed my portfolio in React with Tailwind CSS. It's a professional description of me.

name: TextUtil
discription: The site is built in React, providing various operational functions for text processing.

name: Todo-List
discription: Built in React with JavaScript logic. It allows users to add, update, delete, and manage daily tasks.

name: StockIdeas
discription: Built with Next.js (Frontend) and Laravel (Backend). Helps traders analyze support and resistance levels for stocks.

name: BookStore
discription: A MERN full-stack project implementing authentication and backend functionality for a bookstore application.

name: Voting Application
discription: Backend of a voting application with complete CRUD operations.

name: Real-Time Chat Application
discription: Developed a real-time chat application using Socket.io for instant messaging and Firebase for real-time notifications.
